description: AI-driven strategy for York 5f Handicap based on Racing Post data analysis

selections.name: Azure Angel
selections.reasoning: Outstanding recent form - won just 6 days ago 'comfortably'. Despite low official rating (93), Racing Post rating of 112 suggests class. Fresh and in-form.

selections.name: Regal Envoy
selections.reasoning: Excellent front-running ability, won 18 days ago 'made all'. Strong recent form with multiple wins. Official rating 95 at 6.6 offers value.

selections.name: Jm Jungle
selections.reasoning: Market favorite but price too short. High class (OR 101, RP 113) but won 20 days ago and may be vulnerable to fresher horses.
keyFactors: Won 20 days ago - not as fresh
High official rating but short price
Consistent but may lack recent spark

selections.name: Squealer
selections.reasoning: Consistent placer with high prediction score (98.46). 2nd place 20 days ago shows current form. Good each-way value.

selections.name: Venture Capital
selections.reasoning: Poor recent form (10th 27 days ago). Despite wins earlier in career, current form doesn't justify backing.

selections.name: Democracy Dilemma
selections.reasoning: Despite highest AI prediction score (100), very inconsistent form. Unreliable performer despite high official rating.

selections.name: Seven Questions
selections.reasoning: Outsider with patchy form. Recent runs show inconsistency. Price reflects true chances.

riskManagement.hedgingStrategy: Lay back Azure Angel if price shortens to 3.0

keyInsights: Recent form is crucial in sprint handicaps
Azure Angel's 6-day gap since last win is optimal
Front-runners often succeed over 5f at York
Market may be overrating the favorite Jm Jungle
AI prediction scores correlate with consistency rather than win probability
